markdownRemark.html:
Merge blabbing intro and section about open source.

  • Combinatorial innovation
  • Open source is an awesome example of it

  • In early software, code was isomorphic with the application (tool)

    • Ripe era for combinatorial innovation
    • Individual using software is the operator

  • Internet era flipped model of control

    • Operator became a third party
    • State became important
    • Network effects around state

  • State is critical element, but state is closed

    • Breaks combinatorial innovation
